definitions.text: make known to the public information that was previously known only to a few people or that was meant to be kept a secret
examples: The auction house would not disclose the price at which the van Gogh had sold
The actress won't reveal how old she is
he broke the news to her
unwrap the evidence in the murder case

definitions.text: disclose to view as by removing a cover
examples: The curtain rose to disclose a stunning set
